room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: Had a great time! Ran out of time But going back again to adventure another room

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: Awesome experience! Definitely going back! we did the Heist room and it was an absolute blast even for my 8 yr old. Great option for family time and team building. Can't wait to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: So awesome to have a different type of date night or girls night out! I've done it for both and it was so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: Wowzers!! This was awesome! It was intense up until the very last second!! We didn't escape "The Heist," but, man it was fun!!! Will be back to try the other rooms!Ps. Royce and Lori were great!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: We had a great time. It took all four of us, each with a different skill set. Tells a lot about where your skills lie. We missed it by moments. We will do it again. The rooms are very detailed and well put together. Loved it.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: This was an awesome experience. I took my wife and some good friends for my wife's birthday and it was well worth the money and time. It was a fun and challenging game.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Michigan Escape Games in Davison
review: So much fun! An extraordinary amount of thought and time was put into the room, and it really showed. Exceeded my expectations, the room was exciting, challenging, and clever. Will absolutely return and would recommend to anyone looking for something new, challenging, and unique to do.
